catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 763
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: black lacquered box with gold and silver butterflies; double flute case in black lacquer with gold and silver clouds and dragon design on bottom; bamboo flute inside with dark ribbing; smaller flute with red ribbing and details, both stored in double case; single bamboo flute case in plain wood with gold inscription on one side; also comes with two documents in handscroll form depicting the flute's history; document dated 1774
dimension:
Outer box 9 x 12.1 x 46 cm (3 1/2 x 4 3/4 x 18 1/8 in.)
Flute case: L. 42 cm (16 1/2 in.)
Flutes: L. 39.7 cm (15 5/8 in.) and 37.3 cm (14 5/8 in.)
inscription: inscription in gold inside lid; gold inscription on single flute case
medium: Black lacquer with gold and silver maki-e
title: Noh Flutes named “Winter Wind” (Kogarashi) with Box and Case
